title: Blondy Is Braver Than the Dark
backCoverBlurb: Blondy is a brave explorer, even when the lights go out! Join her as she discovers that the dark night is full of quiet magic and peaceful dreams.
characterDescription: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. She has a wide, happy and energetic smile. She is wearing red pajamas with little white stars.

pages.text: When the sun went down, Blondy saw shadows on the wall. They looked big and strange. Can you show me a brave face?
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is standing in her room at twilight, looking at the wall with a determined and brave expression.

pages.text: Everything felt quiet and a little bit chilly. Shhh... can you hear the night? It was as soft as a whisper.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is sitting on her bed, tilting her head and listening to the quiet sounds of the evening.

pages.text: Blondy hugged her teddy bear. He was warm and fuzzy. I am a brave girl! she said. Point to your heart.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is hugging a soft brown bear tightly and touching her chest with her hand, looking proud.

pages.text: She clicked her little nightlight on. Click! It glowed like a soft, golden star in her room.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is pressing a button on a small star-shaped lamp that is emitting a warm, golden glow.

pages.text: The scary shadows were just her toys! The big monster was only her wooden horse. Phew!
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is looking at a toy horse and smiling, looking very relieved and happy.

pages.text: The night was actually very calm and beautiful. The moon was a smooth, white circle in the sky.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is looking out the window at a bright, full moon that shines into her room.

pages.text: Blondy felt very strong and safe. She knew that the dark was just a time for resting.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is standing tall in her room, looking very empowered and confident.

pages.text: She tucked herself into her soft blankets. They felt like a warm, cozy hug for her whole body.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is lying in bed, pulling up a thick, colorful blanket and looking very comfortable.

pages.text: The stars outside twinkled. Blink, blink! They were like tiny night-lights just for her.
pages.imagePrompt: A clear night sky with millions of tiny, twinkling stars seen through Blondy's bedroom window.

pages.text: Blondy was the bravest explorer of the night. She was ready for the land of dreams.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is smiling peacefully in her bed, with a little dreamy look on her face.

pages.text: It is good to be brave and confident. You did a great job today! Wave goodnight to the moon.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. Blondy is waving her hand at the moon outside with a sweet and tired smile.

pages.text: Goodnight, brave Blondy. Sleep tight and have the most magical, star-filled dreams ever.
pages.imagePrompt: A young girl with curly, light blonde hair and bright blue eyes. A peaceful close-up of Blondy sleeping soundly, looking very calm and safe.
